name: Pizza
ingredients: Dough, tomato sauce, cheese, toppings of choice
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F, spread sauce over dough, add cheese and toppings, bake for 12-15 minutes.

name: Salad
ingredients: Lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, dressing of choice
instructions: Chop ingredients, toss in a bowl with dressing, and serve.

name: Sweet Potato
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F, slice sweet potato, drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle salt, and bake for 25-30 minutes.

name: Gnocchi
instructions: Cook gnocchi in boiling water, sauté in butter and sage, top with Parmesan, and serve.

name: Pot Roast
ingredients: Beef roast, potatoes, carrots, onions, broth
instructions: Sear roast, add to slow cooker with vegetables and broth, cook on low for 8 hours.

name: Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ricotta, mozzarella, marinara sauce, ground beef
instructions: Layer cooked noodles, ricotta, sauce, beef, and cheese, bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

name: Hamburger
ingredients: Ground beef, bun, lettuce, tomato, condiments
instructions: Grill burger patty, assemble with bun, lettuce, tomato, and condiments, and serve.

name: Pad Thai
ingredients: Rice noodles, shrimp, peanuts, egg, Pad Thai sauce
instructions: Cook noodles, stir-fry shrimp and egg, toss with sauce and peanuts, and serve.

name: Almonds
instructions: Eat as a snack or add to dishes for crunch.

name: Sarma
ingredients: Cabbage leaves, ground beef, rice, tomato sauce
instructions: Stuff cabbage leaves with meat and rice, simmer in tomato sauce for 2 hours.

name: Bacon
instructions: Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy, and serve.

name: Hot Dog
instructions: Cook hot dog, place in bun, add toppings, and serve.

name: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, butter
instructions: Mix ingredients, bake at 350°F for 30 minutes, and cool before serving.

name: Wheat Bread
ingredients: Whole wheat flour, yeast, water, salt
instructions: Mix ingredients, knead dough, let rise, bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.

name: Orange
instructions: Peel and eat as a snack or use in recipes.

name: Banana
instructions: Peel and eat as a snack or use in smoothies.

name: Yogurt
instructions: Serve as is or add fruit for flavor.
